rules: Rule1: Provided that plant1 needs special care, if plant1 is transported by the garden truck, then plant1 is relocated to the greenhouse.
Rule2: Either plant1 needs special care or plant1 has a pest infestation.
Rule3: Whenever plant1 has a pest infestation, then in the event that plant1 is transported by the garden truck, plant1 gets relocated to the greenhouse.
Rule4: Under the condition that the soil pH of plant1 has been checked, if plant1 is transported by the garden truck, plant1 is relocated to the greenhouse.

Rule5: Either plant1 is ready for transport, or if it is not the case that when plant1 is scheduled for maintenance and plant1 requires a soil test then the soil pH of plant1 is checked, then the maintenance for plant1 is not cancelled.
Rule6: If plant1 has damaged leaves, then plant1 is not ready for transport.
Rule7: Plant1 has damaged leaves or plant1 has wilted flowers.
Rule8: In the event that plant1 has wilted flowers, plant1 is not ready for transport.
Rule9: Either plant1 is a rare species or plant1 is award-winning.
Rule10: Under the condition that plant1 is award-winning, if plant1 is part of the orchid show exhibition, then the orchid show is successful.
Rule11: Under the condition that plant1 is scheduled for pruning, plant1 is shaped for display.

Rule12: If plant1 is pruned by gardener1, then either plant1 has been removed from the show, or in the event that plant1 is a rare species, then provided plant1 is part of the orchid show exhibition, the orchid show is successful.
Rule13: In case the branches of plant1 have been trimmed, then plant1 is pruned by gardener1.
Rule14: Provided that plant1 has been shaped for display, the branches of plant1 have been trimmed.

Rule15: Either the garden truck is available for transportation, or if it is not the case that when plant1 is featured in the orchid show then the orchid show is successful, then the orchid show is not extended.

Rule16: Either plant1 is infected with blight (disease1), or in case it is not the case that if the orchid show is not successful then plant1 has a fungus, then plant1 has been treated with a fungicide.
Rule17: Either the garden truck has passed the daily inspection or the inspection for the garden truck has been waived.
Rule18: If the inspection for the garden truck has been waived, then the garden truck is not under maintenance.
Rule19: Under the condition that the mechanical check for the garden truck is complete, then if the garden truck has passed the daily inspection, it follows that the garden truck has been fueled.
Rule20: Either the mechanical check for the garden truck is complete or the garden truck is safety certified.
Rule21: Whenever the garden truck is safety certified, then provided that the garden truck has passed the daily inspection, the garden truck has been fueled.
Rule22: Provided that renovation for the tropical pavilion is scheduled, the tropical pavilion has not been renovated.
Rule23: Either renovation for the tropical pavilion is scheduled or the tropical pavilion is not closed.

Rule24: Under the condition that the renovation budget for the tropical pavilion has been approved, then if renovation for the tropical pavilion is scheduled, the tropical pavilion has been renovated.
Rule25: Either the renovation budget for the tropical pavilion has been approved or the tropical pavilion needs emergency repairs.
Rule26: Whenever the tropical pavilion needs emergency repairs, storm damage to the tropical pavilion has been assessed.
Rule27: If structural damage has been found in the tropical pavilion, then provided that renovation for the tropical pavilion is scheduled, the tropical pavilion has been renovated.
Rule28: Under the condition that storm damage to the tropical pavilion has been assessed, structural damage has been found in the tropical pavilion.
Rule29: If plant1 is featured in the orchid show, then plant1 is part of the orchid show exhibition.
Rule30: Provided that plant1 is featured in the orchid show, plant1 is displayed in the tropical pavilion.
Rule31: If it is not the case that when plant1 is scheduled for maintenance and plant1 requires a soil test then the soil pH of plant1 is checked, then the maintenance for plant1 is cancelled.
Rule32: If it is not the case that the garden truck is operational or the garden truck is not available for transportation, then the garden truck is under maintenance.
Rule33: Provided that it is not the case that if plant1 is infected with blight (disease1) then plant1 is quarantined, then plant1 has been destroyed.
Rule34: Under the condition that it is not the case that if plant1 is infected with blight (disease1) then plant1 is quarantined, then plant1 has not been destroyed.
Rule35: If it is not the case that when plant1 is featured in the orchid show then the orchid show is successful, then the orchid show is extended.
Rule36: Provided that it is not the case that if plant1 is displayed in the tropical pavilion then the orchid show is successful, then the tropical pavilion is closed.
Rule37: Under the condition that it is not the case that if plant1 is displayed in the tropical pavilion then the orchid show is successful, then plant1 is transported by the garden truck.
Rule38: In case it is not the case that provided the orchid show is not successful, plant1 has a fungus, then plant1 has not been treated with a fungicide.
Rule39: Provided that the orchid show is not successful, plant1 does not have a fungus.
facts: Fact1: Plant1 requires a soil test.
Fact2: Plant1 is scheduled for maintenance.
Fact3: Plant1 is scheduled for pruning.
Fact4: Plant1 is featured in the orchid show.
Fact5: Plant1 has not been removed from the show.
Fact6: The garden truck is not operational.
Fact7: The garden truck has not been fueled.
Fact9: Plant1 is not relocated to the greenhouse.
